main event: An unidentified flying object resembling a searchlight was observed in Ocean Beach, NJ on August 12, 1959.
interesting points: The object appeared red and was about the size of a football., It moved back and forth over the water before fading out., The observer noted it orbited and returned to the same location several times., The observation lasted for approximately 45 minutes., The weather conditions included a high layer of stratus clouds and hazy visibility.
sighted object: a red object resembling a searchlight in the sky
witness description: The observer was a resident of New Jersey, reliability unknown.
